page.title: 18Microtechnology in Coleshill
page.content: A group of children from Coleshill Middle School took a microtechnology survey in the town.They had to go into every business and ask: 1.The name of the firm 2.The business Address 3.The number of electronic aids 4.What work they were used for Everyone was very helpful.Some people didn't even know what microtechnology was even when they had a computerised telephone or photocopier.We were very surprised to find that Banks had very few computers. There were 61 computers in the town but most were in Chantry House,travel agents and building societies.We thaught there would be many computers in Banks Dentists and Doctors with very few in smaller firms but it turned out to be the opposite.
